excerpt: "The potential of artificial intelligence (AI) to impact vast areas of our lives has not gone unnoticed in the venture capital world. Investment in AI by venture capitalists (VCs) is widespread with almost three quarters of respondents to a Pitchbook poll saying they have invested recently."
